EnemyInfo.Name: Climbing Space Pirate (Pink)
EnemyInfo.Description:
Space Pirate that climbs up and down walls, and can shoot and jump across. The Special->Extended Tilemap should be True.
The enemy has two jump speeds which can be edited at: $B2:EFC3: slowspeed $B2:EFEF: fastspeed - slowspeed

Property.Name: Direction
Property.Description: Which side the wall is on.

Property.Name: Jump Speed
Property.Description: The jump speed is timed and not relative to the distance.

Property.Name: Jump Range
Property.Description: Distance to jump. The enemy ignores the actual wall collision, so make sure this lines up with wall on the far side.
